verses.kjv: And it came to pass after the plague, that the LORD spake unto Moses and unto Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest, saying,
verses.web: After the plague, LORD spoke to Moses and to Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest, saying,
verses.ct: After the plague had ended, the LORD spoke to Moses and to Eleazar son of Aaron the priest.

verses.kjv: Take the sum of all the congregation of the children of Israel, from twenty years old and upward, throughout their fathers’ house, all that are able to go to war in Israel.
verses.web: “Take a census of all the congregation of the children of Israel, from twenty years old and upward, by their fathers’ houses, all who are able to go out to war in Israel.”
verses.ct: He said, "Take a census of the entire Israelite community. Count every man 20 years old and older, by their ancestral families — everyone who is able to serve in Israel's army."

verses.kjv: And Moses and Eleazar the priest spake with them in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,
verses.web: Moses and Eleazar the priest spoke with them in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho, saying,
verses.ct: So Moses and Eleazar the priest addressed the people on the plains of Moab, by the Jordan River across from Jericho.

verses.kjv: Take the sum of the people, from twenty years old and upward; as the LORD commanded Moses and the children of Israel, which went forth out of the land of Egypt.
verses.web: “Take a census, from twenty years old and upward, as LORD commanded Moses and the children of Israel.” These are those that came out of the land of Egypt.
verses.ct: They said, "Count every man 20 years old and older, just as the LORD commanded Moses." These are the Israelites who had come out of Egypt:

verses.kjv: Reuben, the eldest son of Israel: the children of Reuben; Hanoch, of whom cometh the family of the Hanochites: of Pallu, the family of the Palluites:
verses.web: Reuben, the firstborn of Israel; the sons of Reuben: of Hanoch, the family of the Hanochites; of Pallu, the family of the Palluites;
verses.ct: Reuben was Israel's firstborn. His descendants included: from Hanoch, the Hanochite clan; from Pallu, the Palluite clan;

verses.kjv: Of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Carmi, the family of the Carmites.
verses.web: of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites; of Carmi, the family of the Carmites.
verses.ct: from Hezron, the Hezronite clan; and from Carmi, the Carmite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of the Reubenites: and they that were numbered of them were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty.
verses.web: These are the families of the Reubenites; and those who were counted of them were forty-three thousand seven hundred thirty.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Reuben, and their total count was 43,730.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Pallu; Eliab.
verses.web: The son of Pallu: Eliab.
verses.ct: Pallu's son was Eliab.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Eliab; Nemuel, and Dathan, and Abiram. This is that Dathan and Abiram, which were famous in the congregation, who strove against Moses and against Aaron in the company of Korah, when they strove against the LORD:
verses.web: The sons of Eliab: Nemuel, Dathan, and Abiram. These are that Dathan and Abiram who were called by the congregation, who rebelled against Moses and against Aaron in the company of Korah when they rebelled against LORD;
verses.ct: Eliab's sons were Nemuel, Dathan, and Abiram. These were the same Dathan and Abiram — prominent members of the community — who rebelled against Moses and Aaron by joining Korah's revolt against the LORD.

verses.kjv: And the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up together with Korah, when that company died, what time the fire devoured two hundred and fifty men: and they became a sign.
verses.web: and the earth opened its mouth, and swallowed them up together with Korah when that company died; at the time the fire devoured two hundred fifty men, and they became a sign.
verses.ct: The earth opened up and swallowed them along with Korah, and the rest of that group died when fire consumed 250 men. Their fate became a warning to everyone.

verses.kjv: Notwithstanding the children of Korah died not.
verses.web: Notwithstanding, the sons of Korah didn’t die.
verses.ct: However, Korah's own sons did not die.

verses.kjv: The sons of Simeon after their families: of Nemuel, the family of the Nemuelites: of Jamin, the family of the Jaminites: of Jachin, the family of the Jachinites:
verses.web: The sons of Simeon after their families: of Nemuel, the family of the Nemuelites; of Jamin, the family of the Jaminites; of Jachin, the family of the Jachinites;
verses.ct: The descendants of Simeon by their clans were: from Nemuel, the Nemuelite clan; from Jamin, the Jaminite clan; from Jachin, the Jachinite clan;

verses.kjv: Of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites: of Shaul, the family of the Shaulites.
verses.web: of Zerah, the family of the Zerahites; of Shaul, the family of the Shaulites.
verses.ct: from Zerah, the Zarhite clan; and from Shaul, the Shaulite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of the Simeonites, twenty and two thousand and two hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of the Simeonites, twenty-two thousand two hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Simeon, totaling 22,200.

verses.kjv: The children of Gad after their families: of Zephon, the family of the Zephonites: of Haggi, the family of the Haggites: of Shuni, the family of the Shunites:
verses.web: The sons of Gad after their families: of Zephon, the family of the Zephonites; of Haggi, the family of the Haggites; of Shuni, the family of the Shunites;
verses.ct: The descendants of Gad by their clans were: from Zephon, the Zephonite clan; from Haggi, the Haggite clan; from Shuni, the Shunite clan;

verses.kjv: Of Ozni, the family of the Oznites: of Eri, the family of the Erites:
verses.web: of Ozni, the family of the Oznites; of Eri, the family of the Erites;
verses.ct: from Ozni, the Oznite clan; from Eri, the Erite clan;

verses.kjv: Of Arod, the family of the Arodites: of Areli, the family of the Arelites.
verses.web: of Arod, the family of the Arodites; of Areli, the family of the Arelites.
verses.ct: from Arod, the Arodite clan; and from Areli, the Arelite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of the children of Gad according to those that were numbered of them, forty thousand and five hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of the sons of Gad according to those who were counted of them, forty thousand and five hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Gad, and their total count was 40,500.

verses.kjv: The sons of Judah were Er and Onan: and Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.
verses.web: The sons of Judah: Er and Onan. Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.
verses.ct: Judah's sons included Er and Onan, but both Er and Onan had died in the land of Canaan.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Judah after their families were; of Shelah, the family of the Shelanites: of Pharez, the family of the Pharzites: of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites.
verses.web: The sons of Judah after their families were: of Shelah, the family of the Shelanites; of Perez, the family of the Perezites; of Zerah, the family of the Zerahites.
verses.ct: The surviving descendants of Judah by their clans were: from Shelah, the Shelanite clan; from Pharez, the Pharzite clan; and from Zerah, the Zarhite clan.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Pharez were; of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Hamul, the family of the Hamulites.
verses.web: The sons of Perez were: of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites; of Hamul, the family of the Hamulites.
verses.ct: Pharez's descendants were: from Hezron, the Hezronite clan; and from Hamul, the Hamulite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of Judah according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and sixteen thousand and five hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of Judah according to those who were counted of them, seventy-six thousand five hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Judah, totaling 76,500.

verses.kjv: Of the sons of Issachar after their families: of Tola, the family of the Tolaites: of Pua, the family of the Punites:
verses.web: The sons of Issachar after their families: of Tola, the family of the Tolaites; of Puvah, the family of the Punites;
verses.ct: The descendants of Issachar by their clans were: from Tola, the Tolaite clan; from Pua, the Punite clan;

verses.kjv: Of Jashub, the family of the Jashubites: of Shimron, the family of the Shimronites.
verses.web: of Jashub, the family of the Jashubites; of Shimron, the family of the Shimronites.
verses.ct: from Jashub, the Jashubite clan; and from Shimron, the Shimronite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of Issachar according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and four thousand and three hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of Issachar according to those who were counted of them, sixty-four thousand three hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Issachar, totaling 64,300.

verses.kjv: Of the sons of Zebulun after their families: of Sered, the family of the Sardites: of Elon, the family of the Elonites: of Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.
verses.web: The sons of Zebulun after their families: of Sered, the family of the Seredites; of Elon, the family of the Elonites; of Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.
verses.ct: The descendants of Zebulun by their clans were: from Sered, the Sardite clan; from Elon, the Elonite clan; and from Jahleel, the Jahleelite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those that were numbered of them, threescore thousand and five hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those who were counted of them, sixty thousand five hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Zebulun, totaling 60,500.

verses.kjv: The sons of Joseph after their families were Manasseh and Ephraim.
verses.web: The sons of Joseph after their families: Manasseh and Ephraim.
verses.ct: The descendants of Joseph formed two tribal groups: Manasseh and Ephraim.

verses.kjv: Of the sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites: and Machir begat Gilead: of Gilead come the family of the Gileadites.
verses.web: The sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites; and Machir became the father of Gilead; of Gilead, the family of the Gileadites.
verses.ct: From Manasseh: Machir founded the Machirite clan. Machir was the father of Gilead, and from Gilead came the Gileadite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the sons of Gilead: of Jeezer, the family of the Jeezerites: of Helek, the family of the Helekites:
verses.web: These are the sons of Gilead: of Iezer, the family of the Iezerites; of Helek, the family of the Helekites;
verses.ct: Gilead's descendants were: from Jeezer, the Jeezerite clan; from Helek, the Helekite clan;

verses.kjv: And of Asriel, the family of the Asrielites: and of Shechem, the family of the Shechemites:
verses.web: and Asriel, the family of the Asrielites; and Shechem, the family of the Shechemites;
verses.ct: from Asriel, the Asrielite clan; from Shechem, the Shechemite clan;

verses.kjv: And of Shemida, the family of the Shemidaites: and of Hepher, the family of the Hepherites.
verses.web: and Shemida, the family of the Shemidaites; and Hepher, the family of the Hepherites.
verses.ct: from Shemida, the Shemidaite clan; and from Hepher, the Hepherite clan.

verses.kjv: And Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons, but daughters: and the names of the daughters of Zelophehad were Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
verses.web: Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons, but daughters: and the names of the daughters of Zelophehad were Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
verses.ct: Now Zelophehad son of Hepher had no sons — only daughters. Their names were Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.

verses.kjv: These are the families of Manasseh, and those that were numbered of them, fifty and two thousand and seven hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of Manasseh. Those who were counted of them were fifty-two thousand seven hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Manasseh, totaling 52,700.

verses.kjv: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthalhites: of Becher, the family of the Bachrites: of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.
verses.web: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthelahites; of Becher, the family of the Becherites; of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.
verses.ct: The descendants of Ephraim by their clans were: from Shuthelah, the Shuthalhite clan; from Becher, the Bachrite clan; and from Tahan, the Tahanite clan.

verses.kjv: And these are the sons of Shuthelah: of Eran, the family of the Eranites.
verses.web: These are the sons of Shuthelah: of Eran, the family of the Eranites.
verses.ct: Shuthelah's descendant was Eran, who founded the Eranite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim according to those that were numbered of them, thirty and two thousand and five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph after their families.
verses.web: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim according to those who were counted of them, thirty-two thousand five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph after their families.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Ephraim, totaling 32,500. Together, these were the descendants of Joseph by their clans.

verses.kjv: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites: of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites: of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:
verses.web: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites; of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites; of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites;
verses.ct: The descendants of Benjamin by their clans were: from Bela, the Belaite clan; from Ashbel, the Ashbelite clan; from Ahiram, the Ahiramite clan;

verses.kjv: Of Shupham, the family of the Shuphamites: of Hupham, the family of the Huphamites.
verses.web: of Shephupham, the family of the Shuphamites; of Hupham, the family of the Huphamites.
verses.ct: from Shupham, the Shuphamite clan; and from Hupham, the Huphamite clan.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman: of Ard, the family of the Ardites: and of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.
verses.web: The sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman: the family of the Ardites; and of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.
verses.ct: Bela's sons were Ard and Naaman. From Ard came the Ardite clan, and from Naaman came the Naamite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and six hundred.
verses.web: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families; and those who were counted of them were forty-five thousand six hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Benjamin, totaling 45,600.

verses.kjv: These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.
verses.web: These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.
verses.ct: The descendants of Dan by their clans were: from Shuham, the Shuhamite clan. These were all the clans traced back to Dan.

verses.kjv: All the families of the Shuhamites, according to those that were numbered of them, were threescore and four thousand and four hundred.
verses.web: All the families of the Shuhamites, according to those who were counted of them, were sixty-four thousand four hundred.
verses.ct: The total count of all the Shuhamite clans was 64,400.

verses.kjv: Of the children of Asher after their families: of Jimna, the family of the Jimnites: of Jesui, the family of the Jesuites: of Beriah, the family of the Beriites.
verses.web: The sons of Asher after their families: of Imnah, the family of the Imnites; of Ishvi, the family of the Ishvites; of Beriah, the family of the Berites.
verses.ct: The descendants of Asher by their clans were: from Jimna, the Jimnite clan; from Jesui, the Jesuite clan; and from Beriah, the Beriite clan.

verses.kjv: Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber, the family of the Heberites: of Malchiel, the family of the Malchielites.
verses.web: Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber, the family of the Heberites; of Malchiel, the family of the Malchielites.
verses.ct: From Beriah's line: Heber founded the Heberite clan, and Malchiel founded the Malchielite clan.

verses.kjv: And the name of the daughter of Asher was Sarah.
verses.web: The name of the daughter of Asher was Serah.
verses.ct: Asher also had a daughter named Sarah.

verses.kjv: These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those that were numbered of them; who were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those who were counted of them, fifty-three thousand and four hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Asher, totaling 53,400.

verses.kjv: Of the sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites: of Guni, the family of the Gunites:
verses.web: The sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites; of Guni, the family of the Gunites;
verses.ct: The descendants of Naphtali by their clans were: from Jahzeel, the Jahzeelite clan; from Guni, the Gunite clan;

verses.kjv: Of Jezer, the family of the Jezerites: of Shillem, the family of the Shillemites.
verses.web: of Jezer, the family of the Jezerites; of Shillem, the family of the Shillemites.
verses.ct: from Jezer, the Jezerite clan; and from Shillem, the Shillemite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of Naphtali according to their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and four hundred.
verses.web: These are the families of Naphtali according to their families; and those who were counted of them were forty-five thousand four hundred.
verses.ct: These were the clans of Naphtali, totaling 45,400.

verses.kjv: These were the numbered of the children of Israel, six hundred thousand and a thousand seven hundred and thirty.
verses.web: These are those who were counted of the children of Israel, six hundred one thousand seven hundred thirty.
verses.ct: The grand total of all the Israelite men counted was 601,730.

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: Then the LORD said to Moses,

verses.kjv: Unto these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.
verses.web: “To these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.
verses.ct: "The land is to be divided among these people as their inheritance, based on the number of names counted."

verses.kjv: To many thou shalt give the more inheritance, and to few thou shalt give the less inheritance: to every one shall his inheritance be given according to those that were numbered of him.
verses.web: To the more you shall give the more inheritance, and to the fewer you shall give the less inheritance. To everyone according to those who were counted of him shall his inheritance be given.
verses.ct: "Give a larger portion to a larger tribe and a smaller portion to a smaller tribe. Each tribe's inheritance should match the size of its population."

verses.kjv: Notwithstanding the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
verses.web: Notwithstanding, the land shall be divided by lot. According to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
verses.ct: "However, the land must be distributed by casting lots. Each tribe will receive its territory under the name of its ancestral tribe."

verses.kjv: According to the lot shall the possession thereof be divided between many and few.
verses.web: According to the lot shall their inheritance be divided between the more and the fewer.”
verses.ct: "The lot will determine where each inheritance falls, whether the tribe is large or small."

verses.kjv: And these are they that were numbered of the Levites after their families: of Gershon, the family of the Gershonites: of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites: of Merari, the family of the Merarites.
verses.web: These are those who were counted of the Levites after their families: of Gershon, the family of the Gershonites; of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites; of Merari, the family of the Merarites.
verses.ct: The Levites were counted separately by their clans: from Gershon, the Gershonite clan; from Kohath, the Kohathite clan; and from Merari, the Merarite clan.

verses.kjv: These are the families of the Levites: the family of the Libnites, the family of the Hebronites, the family of the Mahlites, the family of the Mushites, the family of the Korathites. And Kohath begat Amram.
verses.web: These are the families of Levi: the family of the Libnites, the family of the Hebronites, the family of the Mahlites, the family of the Mushites, and the family of the Korahites. Kohath became the father of Amram.
verses.ct: The Levite clans also included the Libnites, the Hebronites, the Mahlites, the Mushites, and the Korathites. Kohath was the father of Amram.

verses.kjv: And the name of Amram’s wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, whom her mother bare to Levi in Egypt: and she bare unto Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.
verses.web: The name of Amram’s wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, who was born to Levi in Egypt. She bore to Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.
verses.ct: Amram's wife was Jochebed, a daughter of Levi who was born to him in Egypt. She bore Amram three children: Aaron, Moses, and their sister Miriam.

verses.kjv: And unto Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
verses.web: To Aaron were born Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar.
verses.ct: Aaron's sons were Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

verses.kjv: And Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before the LORD.
verses.web: Nadab and Abihu died when they offered strange fire before LORD.
verses.ct: But Nadab and Abihu died when they offered unauthorized fire before the LORD.

verses.kjv: And those that were numbered of them were twenty and three thousand, all males from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.
verses.web: Those who were counted of them were twenty-three thousand, every male from a month old and upward; for they were not counted among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.
verses.ct: The total count of Levite males one month old and older was 23,000. They were not included in the main census of Israel because they received no land inheritance among the Israelites.

verses.kjv: These are they that were numbered by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho.
verses.web: These are those who were counted by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who counted the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho.
verses.ct: These are the results of the census taken by Moses and Eleazar the priest on the plains of Moab, by the Jordan River across from Jericho.

verses.kjv: But among these there was not a man of them whom Moses and Aaron the priest numbered, when they numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.
verses.web: But among these there was not a man of them who were counted by Moses and Aaron the priest, who counted the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.
verses.ct: Not a single person from this census had been counted in the earlier census that Moses and Aaron conducted in the wilderness of Sinai.

verses.kjv: For the LORD had said of them, They shall surely die in the wilderness. And there was not left a man of them, save Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun.
verses.web: For LORD had said of them, “They shall surely die in the wilderness.” There was not a man left of them, except Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun.
verses.ct: The LORD had declared that the earlier generation would die in the wilderness, and every one of them had — except for Caleb son of Jephunneh and Joshua son of Nun.
